message:
WARNING!

If you play video games â€” please note that this tool runs on AutoHotkey, which may be prohibited in games, including running in the background, due to players using .ahk scripts to gain unfair advantages over other players.

To avoid issues with game anti-cheat systems, it is recommended to disable all AutoHotkey processes before playing.

The risk is highest in the following games: Marvel Rivals, Apex Legends, games with BattlEye anti-cheat.

prepare.fonts_not_found:
Fonts used by the utility are missing from the system.
Close this window to obtain them.

Fonts to install:

Rename the custom recipe section.
warnings.xcompose_cannot_be_edited: Recipes extracted from â€œ.XComposeâ€ files cannot be deleted or edited.
warnings.invalid_name: Name must contain only English letters â€œaâ€“Zâ€, digits (not at the beginning), and underscore â€œ_â€.

description:
Combination: {var:Window}{var:LeftAlt} F
Most library symbols have their own tags, which are variants of the symbol name that can be used for insertion through search.
Enter a tag completely or partially (or entry name) to insert the corresponding symbol. You can enter multiple queries at once, separating them with commas. Examples:
 â€¢ â€œhellenic capital letter lambdaâ€, â€œhel lamâ€, â€œhel_c_let_l_lambdaâ€ â†’ â€œÎ›â€
 â€¢ â€œĞ´ĞµĞ· Ğ´Ğ¸, !Ğ´ĞµĞ· Ğ´Ğ¸â€, â€œlam, !lamâ€ â†’ â€œğ”ğ¼â€, â€œÎ›Î»â€.
 â€¢ â€œreference_markâ€ â†’ â€œâ€»â€.

Notes:
 â€¢ The shorter the query â€” the less precise it is.
 â€¢ The â€œ!â€ sign at the beginning of a query tells the search to use case sensitivity.
 â€¢ Simple regular expressions are supported, for example:
    â€£ â€œfut.*?\s+\S+alâ€ â†’ â€œášºâ€ (Hagalaz rune)
    â€£ â€œaz$â€ â†’ â€œá›â€ (Mannaz rune)
    â€£ â€œ^Ñ„Ñ€â€ â†’ â€œâ‚£â€ (Franc).

When searching, you can specify the desired glyph variation by adding â€œ::<VARIATION>â€ to the end of the query, for example: â€œlat m::frakturâ€ â†’ â€œğ”â€.

The search field supports the ability to call some functions and methods, including:
â€ƒâ€¢â€‚â€œ\â€ or â€œ/Reloadâ€ â€” restart the program.
â€ƒâ€¢â€‚â€œ/Exitâ€ â€” close the program.
â€ƒâ€¢â€‚â€œ/ChrLib.Printâ€ â€” generate and open an .HTML file with a list of library symbols.
â€ƒâ€¢â€‚â€œ/MyRecipes.Updateâ€ â€” re-initialize custom recipes.
â€ƒâ€¢â€‚â€œ/Update.Getâ€ or â€œ/Update.Repairâ€ â€” get update or repair current version.
â€ƒâ€¢â€‚â€œ/KbdBinder.Initâ€ â€” re-initialize layouts and bindings.
